name: Leaving The Craddle
description:
Controls:
Left Mouse Button - place / Right Mouse Button - delete (hold for brush);
ESC - escape menu / M - main menu;
R - generate next.

Custom rules:
1. Limited placement zone;
2. Toxins - barrier: explode after coming in contact with machines deleting everything in a small radius;
3. Iron deposits - highway: new reproduction rules make the machines follow these paths allowing to get into the shadow of obstacles faster than it could be done by dismantling the obstacle with bombardment by bots.
